```{r}
library(tidyverse)
```

```{r}
gas_demand <-
  read.csv('Scotland_Gas_Demand_and_CWV_01-01-2021_31-12-2024.csv') %>%
  mutate(across(c('Applicable.At', 'Applicable.For', 'Generated.Time'),
                function(x) as.Date(x, format = '%d/%m/%Y')),
         time_stamp = Applicable.For) %>%
  filter(Quality.Indicator == '') %>%
  pivot_wider(id_cols = time_stamp, names_from = Data.Item, values_from = Value)
```

```{r}
ggplot(gas_demand,
       aes(x = time_stamp, y = .data[['Demand Actual, LDZ (SC), D+6']])) +
  geom_line() +
  ggtitle('Demand Actual, LDZ (SC), D+6')
```
